mapper.select: select cart_user_id, cart_item_id, cart_count, cart_reg_date, item_name, item_price, img_name from cart as c inner join item i on c.cart_item_id = i.item_id where i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%') and c.cart_user_id = #{cartUserId}
SELECT * FROM cart WHERE cart_user_id=#{cartUserId} and cart_item_id=#{cartItemId}
select cart_user_id, cart_item_id, cart_count, cart_reg_date, item_name, item_price, img_name from cart as c inner join item i on c.cart_item_id = i.item_id
mapper.insert: insert into cart values (#{cartUserId},#{cartItemId},#{cartCount},SYSDATE() ) on duplicate key update cart_count= cart_count+#{cartCount}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET cart_count=#{cartCount} WHERE cart_user_id=#{cartUserId} and cart_item_id=#{cartItemId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_user_id=#{cartUserId} and cart_item_id=#{cartItemId}
